name: edeXa
description: edeXa is the first HYBRID business blockchain used by companies, organizations and authorities. Thanks to a robust, secure and energy-efficient Business Blockchain, edeXa offers companies and public authorities an ecosystem that can build trust through secure and traceable processes. Intending to make blockchain technology easy for companies and organizations, edeXa provides numerous services and interfaces (APIs) available to customers. Trusted by over 27,000+ companies, edeXa ensures transparent and real-time transactions across industries.
